sentences.en: A few more traveler's checks may come in handy on holiday.
sentences.cn: 多带几张旅行支票,度假时会有用的.

sentences.en: a handy little tool
sentences.cn: 好用的小工具

sentences.en: Do you have a piece of paper handy?
sentences.cn: 你手边有纸吗？

sentences.en: handy hints/tips for removing stains
sentences.cn: 清除污渍的妙招 / 窍门儿

sentences.en: I always keep my gun handy just in case.
sentences.cn: 我总是随身带着枪以防万一。

sentences.en: It may come in handy.
sentences.cn: 这东西迟早会有用处.

sentences.en: It's handy to have the thermos here.
sentences.cn: 暖瓶放在这儿好拿.

sentences.en: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.cn: 这件小工具非常有用。

sentences.en: It’s very handy having a light above your desk.
sentences.cn: 书桌上方有盏灯很有用。

sentences.en: Keep a pad handy to jot down queries as they occur.
sentences.cn: 手边放一本便笺簿，以便有问题时随时记下。

sentences.en: Keep handy a lightweight sweater or cardigan.
sentences.cn: 手边备一件薄的套头毛衣或开襟毛衫。

sentences.en: She is a handy girl who can turn her hand to anything.
sentences.cn: 她是个心灵手巧的姑娘.

sentences.en: She is handy with the needle.
sentences.cn: 她是做针线活的巧手.

sentences.en: Take your swimming trunks with you – they might come in handy (= be useful ).
sentences.cn: 带上你的游泳裤，可能会派上用场的。

sentences.en: That key will come in handy if you lock yourself out.
sentences.cn: 要是你把自己锁在了屋外，那把钥匙就派上用场了。

sentences.en: The $20 check came in very handy.
sentences.cn: 那张20美元的支票正好派上了用场。

sentences.en: The booklet is very practical and handy of reference.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子很实用,而且便于查考.

sentences.en: the sort of junk that might come in handy one day.
sentences.cn: 这种废旧物有一天可能会派上用场。

sentences.en: This is a very handy tool for opening cans.
sentences.cn: 这是一种很简便的开罐头工具.

sentences.en: This lively town is handy for Londoners.
sentences.cn: 这个热闹的小城离伦敦很近。

sentences.en: This spade is very handy.
sentences.cn: 这把铁锹使起来挺顺手.

sentences.en: To make it easier to contact us, keep this card handy.
sentences.cn: 把这张卡放在手边，以便于和我们联系。
